Data.text_description:
The probability of weather conditions being good (A=1) is 0.5458. 
For those with weather conditions being bad (A=0), the probability of temperature being hot (B=1) is 0.4468. 
For those with weather conditions being good (A=1), the probability of temperature being hot (B=1) is 0.3112. 
For those with weather conditions being bad (A=0), the probability of humidity being high (C=1) is 0.3773. 
For those with weather conditions being good (A=1), the probability of humidity being high (C=1) is 0.1097. 
For those with weather conditions being bad (A=0), the probability of precipitation being abundant (D=1) is 0.3849. 
For those with weather conditions being good (A=1), the probability of precipitation being abundant (D=1) is 0.4165.
